metadata.description: Dynamic tab structure for SBI Land Property Details template

tabs.description: Basic property information and location details

sections.description: Locality surroundings, physical characteristics, land usage, and planning approvals
Road access, utility services, and additional site information

tabs.description: Detailed assessment of site conditions, infrastructure, and environmental factors

sections.description: Land area calculations and market rates
Building specifications table with floor-wise details
Floor wise specifications table with floor-wise details

tabs.description: Detailed valuation components and final calculations

fields.placeholder: Name of the owner(s) and his/their address (es) with Phone no. (details of share of each owner in case of joint ownership)
fields.helpText: Enter the full name, address and contact details of all property owners. For joint ownership, specify ownership share percentage for each owner.
Enter the full name of the borrower/client applying for the loan
Enter complete postal address including street name, landmark, city, state and PIN code
Provide detailed description of the property including type, size, features and current condition

subFields.helpText: Enter the official plot number or survey number as per property documents
Enter the door number/house number assigned by local authorities
Enter the Town Survey number and village name where property is located
Enter the administrative division (ward/taluka/tehsil) where property is located
Enter the mandal and district name where property is located

fields.helpText: Select whether the property is located in a city, town or village

subFields.helpText: Select the socio-economic classification of the area where property is located
Select whether the property is in an urban, semi-urban or rural area
Select whether the area is primarily residential, commercial or industrial
Select the municipal corporation under whose jurisdiction the property falls

subFields.placeholder: Whether covered under any State/ Central Govt. enactments...
subFields.helpText: Specify if property falls under any state or central government regulations/acts

subFields.placeholder: In case it is an agricultural land, any conversion to house site plots is contemplated
subFields.helpText: For agricultural land, mention if conversion to residential/commercial plots is planned

fields.helpText: Enter boundary details and dimensions for all four sides of the property as per documents and actual measurements

subFields.helpText: Enter the latitude coordinates of the property location
Enter the longitude coordinates of the property location
Enter the total site area in specified units as per property documents
Enter the area being considered for property valuation in specified units
Enter details of current occupants/tenants of the property

fields.description: Classification and development status of the surrounding area

subFields.placeholder: Describe proximity and feasibility to schools, hospitals, bus stops, markets etc.
subFields.helpText: Distance and accessibility to essential services and facilities

fields.description: Topography, shape, and environmental conditions of the land

subFields.helpText: Possibility of frequent flooding or sub-merging

fields.description: Permitted usage types and any restrictions on the property

subFields.helpText: Type of use to which the land can be put

subFields.placeholder: Describe any usage restrictions, zoning regulations, or building limitations...

fields.description: Town planning status and layout approvals

subFields.helpText: Location of the plot in the layout
Whether the property has free access or is land-locked

fields.description: Additional advantages and special remarks about the site

subFields.placeholder: Describe unique advantages, features, or selling points of the site...
subFields.helpText: Positive aspects that enhance the property value

subFields.placeholder: Any special remarks, notifications, or additional information...
subFields.helpText: Include any threat of acquisition, road widening, CRZ provisions, etc.

Enter maximum market rate in Rs

Total built-up area across all floors
